__e: And that she did not want to contribute to the toll of human misery and suffering in the world.
You want me to be miserable and alone like you?
If one of them comes to me, it means they're both miserable, and that's my job, putting people out of their misery.
If you have nothing better to do than witness the misery you have caused, then let me know it and leave me alone.
What is there left to do but put you out of your misery?
But it isn't right to live so violently either.
Bring that thing back out into the world.
With all the horror that's going on in the world, what difference does it make?
How can we sleep at night when there's so much suffering in the world? Well, I-
I thought it was supposed to be the beginning of all human misery.
The point is, for the first time I realized that it wasn't only up to me to stop it.
But why is other people's pain a source of amusement?
